name: Demolition Car Fighting Derby :Auto Machine War
name_original: Demolition Car Fighting Derby :Auto Machine War
description:
Demolition Car Fighting Derby :Auto Machine War 2017

Are you ready for a CRAZY Death Car derby smash experience!!! Can you survive the deadly Fight of demolition derby?

Can you survive deadly demolition mania ? Get ready for the ultimate death race and Destroy your Rivals in Crash destruction. HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE THE ARENA ?
Extreme clash of Derby cars, Steel Destruction & Disassembly in Demolition Of Rival Derby Cars, Smash, disintegrate, demolish, challenge & take revenge from your opponent, Crazy action packed game it is, test your skills, give trial to see how long you can survive.
Demolition Derby Car will Wreck, Hit, Crash, Kill & havoc in arena of car fight!
Extreme Car Battle in Mighty Battle Arena. Smash your car in rival cars to damage & knockout his car. Destroy the vanguard of demolition cars, blazing fire, challenging, hitting & inflicting damage on other cars. Hit with force & face of your vehicle.
Drive reckless to hit as many and damage maximum derby cars, you are a monster on the loose, don't fall pray to the war, be the hero take revenge of damage, let them fell to prank, race, drive, hit, kill and escape the hit of others.
Destroy first car to drew first blood, then second then go on a killing spree of three cars, with triple kill then ultra damage of destruction & then rampage of chaos and mayhem, crash & smash. buckle up for the epic car war, battle of vehicles which are monster smasher racing in rally wrecking rough grounds and bump, crash racing in junkyard to avoid rooftops, offroad and mountains. Its a real destruction derby a death match race in circuit track raging war on cars stock.
This game contains the most badass vehicle the world has endured, the trauma of being second linger of drivers, take revenge and drive ahead in the monster 3D car on highway or on off-road because its a Destruction Derby mania to deadly damage the arena which no bus or truck can do. Attack from side ways, like stealth strike are done, your driving squad skills are tested here, show your elite stunt crew training & destroy your rival. your armor is thick like war robots, your car is constructed like a war machine which fight without any gun.

Demolition Car Fighting Derby :Auto Machine War : Game Features:

- Nerve wracking action
- Choose your favorite derby car model.
- Action Packed game of 2k16
- Real-time vehicle destruction and damage
- Awesome environments: Derby Arena, Roof Top Helipad.
- Realistic Vehicle Physics and smooth controls.
- No Wifi No Problem!
- Smash & Crash, Have fun
FREE download • Completely free-to-play
